36/**
37 * \file
38 *
39 * This file contains functions for the SHM side.
40 */
41
42#ifndef UTIL_SHM_SIDE_MAIN_H
43#define UTIL_SHM_SIDE_MAIN_H
44struct daemon;
45struct worker;
46
47/* get struct ub_shm_stat_info */
48#include "libunbound/unbound.h"
49
50/**
51 * The SHM info.
52 */
53struct shm_main_info {
54 /** stats_info array, shared memory segment.
55 * [0] is totals, [1..thread_num] are per-thread stats */
56 struct ub_stats_info* ptr_arr;
57 /** the global stats block, shared memory segment */
58 struct ub_shm_stat_info* ptr_ctl;
59 int key;
60 int id_ctl;
61 int id_arr;
62};
63
64int shm_main_init(struct daemon* daemon);
65void shm_main_shutdown(struct daemon* daemon);
66void shm_main_run(struct worker *worker);
67
68#endif /* UTIL_SHM_SIDE_MAIN_H */
69
